title: Vegan Glory
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Thai, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out
description: Re-opening July 10, 2015 after remodeling. Small vegetarian Thai food restaurant near the Beverly Center. Features a vegan menu with a variety of soy based meat-substitutes and tofu in Thai entrees. Also makes American style dishes like wraps, veggie burgers, and salads. Lunch specials. Quick service, casual setting.
